title: Chris Bryant – 2022 Apology Over Taking Photo in Parliamentary Lobbies
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Chris Bryant, the Labour MP for the Rhondda, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content: I have deleted the tweet I posted of a photo I took in the Commons lobby last night, at the request of the Sergeant at Arms. I accept I broke Commons etiquette in taking the photo. I did so to expose a wrong. I have apologised. I’m happy to take it down as requested.
